/*
    Aleksandar "Al3kSaNdaR" Ivanovic

    COUNTSTR
*/
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int N, M, T, X1, Y1, X2, Y2;

int main ( void )
{
    scanf ( "%d %d", &N, &M );

    int Number, DP[N + 1][M + 1];

    for ( int i = 1; i <= N; i++ )
        for ( int j = 1; j <= M; j++ )
        {
            scanf ( "%d", &Number );

            DP[i][j] = Number + DP[i - 1][j] + DP[i][j - 1] - DP[i - 1][j - 1];
        }

    scanf ( "%d", &T );

    for ( int i = 0; i < T; i++ )
    {
        scanf ( "%d %d %d %d", &X1, &Y1, &X2, &Y2 );

        printf ( "%d\n", DP[X2][Y2] - DP[X1 - 1][Y2] - DP[X2][Y1 - 1] + DP[X1 - 1][Y1 - 1] );
    }

    return 0;
}
